channel.title: geopandas on James Brennan
channel.description: Recent content in geopandas on James Brennan

item.title: Fast and easy gridding of point data with geopandas
item.description: This post looks at using the geopandas library to do fast efficient gridding of point data onto a regular grid. Geopandas is a python package that provides a geospatial extension to pandas – so that dataframes can store geographic data such as points and polygons.
